article_title: Blue Cross Plans Create Giant Database To Spur Cost Transparency

article_metadata.description: The nation’s Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans say they have accumulated a database of more than 2.3 billion medical procedures that will allow them to compare and measure healthcare costs and quality down to every zip code in the country. Known as Blue Cross Blue Shield Axis, the data repository [...]
